name: JOA Oil & Gas
overview: JOA Oil & Gas B.V. provides geological and reservoir simulation software for oil and gas industries. The company offers JewelSuite 3D gridding technology, which allows handling of complex geological structures and integrates seismic data, the geological model, flow simulation, and field geomechanics in one workflow; and JewelSuite Software Development Kit, a set of resources used for integrating external software into the JewelSuite framework. It also provides support and training services. The company offers its products through resellers and distributors in Thailand, Australia, Indonesia, and the Middle East. It has a strategic partnership with Baker Hughes. The company is based in Delft, the Netherlands with additional offices in Moscow, Russia; Albuquerque, New Mexico; Houston, Texas; Jakarta, Indonesia; Aberdeen, the United Kingdom; and Lagos, Nigeria. JOA Oil & Gas B.V. operates as a subsidiary of JOA group.

funding_rounds.source_description: Baker Hughes Nederland Holdings to acquire equity in JOA Oil & Gas BV
